sourcesContent:
import React, {Component, useState} from 'react'
import { Card, Form, Button, Alert, Container, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'
import { FaTrashAlt, FaPencilAlt } from "react-icons/fa"
import { IoFastFood, IoLocationSharp, IoTimeSharp, IoSaveSharp } from "react-icons/io5";

class Edit extends Component {



    state = {
        show: false,
        name: "",
        reservation: "",
        notes: ""
    }

    handleClose = () => this.setState({show: false})
    handleShow = () => this.setState({show: true})

    handleNameChange = (e) => {
        this.setState({
            name: e.target.value
        })
        console.log(name)
    }

render() {
    return (
        <>
          <Button variant="light" onClick={this.handleShow}>
           <FaPencilAlt />
          </Button>
    
          <Modal show={this.state.show} onHide={this.handleClose}>
            <Modal.Header closeButton>
              <Modal.Title>Edit Record for: {this.props.name} </Modal.Title>
            </Modal.Header>
            <Modal.Body>
            <Form>
                <Form.Group id="name">
                    <small>Restaurant Name: </small>
                    <Form.Control type="name" placeholder="New Restaraunt Name" onChange={this.handleNameChange} />
                </Form.Group>

                <Form.Group id="reservation">
                    <small>Reservation: </small>
                    <Form.Control type="name" placeholder="June 6th 2021"/>
                </Form.Group>

                <Form.Group id="notes">
                    <small>Notes: </small>
                    <Form.Control type="name" placeholder="Delicious breadsticks!"/>
                </Form.Group>

                <Button className="w-100" type="submit" variant="success"><IoSaveSharp /></Button>
            </Form>
            </Modal.Body>
          </Modal>
        </>
      );
    }
}

export default Edit
